query.description:
name of entry (matches via substring
- i.e. "at" would return
"cat" and "atlas")

response.name: Get Link Holiday

query.description:
name of entry (matches via substring
- i.e. "at" would return
"cat" and "atlas")

auth type of entry (can only be values
matching in project or
null)
return entries that support HTTPS or not
return entries of a specific category

response.body:
{
    "count": 5,
    "entries": [
        {
            "API": "Abstract Public Holidays",
            "Description": "Data on national, regional, and religious holidays via API",
            "Auth": "apiKey",
            "HTTPS": true,
            "Cors": "yes",
            "Link": "https://www.abstractapi.com/holidays-api",
            "Category": "Calendar"
        },
        {
            "API": "Checkiday - National Holiday API",
            "Description": "Industry-leading Holiday API. Over 5,000 holidays and thousands of descriptions. Trusted by the Worldâ€™s leading companies",
            "Auth": "apiKey",
            "HTTPS": true,
            "Cors": "unknown",
            "Link": "https://apilayer.com/marketplace/checkiday-api",
            "Category": "Calendar"
        },
        {
            "API": "Festivo Public Holidays",
            "Description": "Fastest and most advanced public holiday and observance service on the market",
            "Auth": "apiKey",
            "HTTPS": true,
            "Cors": "yes",
            "Link": "https://docs.getfestivo.com/docs/products/public-holidays-api/intro",
            "Category": "Calendar"
        },
        {
            "API": "Holidays",
            "Description": "Historical data regarding holidays",
            "Auth": "apiKey",
            "HTTPS": true,
            "Cors": "unknown",
            "Link": "https://holidayapi.com/",
            "Category": "Calendar"
        },
        {
            "API": "UK Bank Holidays",
            "Description": "Bank holidays in England and Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland",
            "Auth": "",
            "HTTPS": true,
            "Cors": "unknown",
            "Link": "https://www.gov.uk/bank-holidays.json",
            "Category": "Calendar"
        }
    ]
}

response.name: Get Count Animals

query.description:
name of entry (matches via substring
- i.e. "at" would return
"cat" and "atlas")

matching in project or
null)
return entries that support HTTPS or not
